Aerilate: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Flying-type and deals 1.2x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.
Aftermath: Deals 25% damage when KOed by contact damage.
Analytic: Raises the power of all moves by 30% if the wielder moves last.
Anger Point: Raises Attack to +6 if struck by a critical hit.
Anticipation: Alerts the Pokemon of certain dangerous moves.
Arena Trap: Prevents opposing grounded Pokemon from switching and increases wild encounter rate. Ghost-type Pokemon are unaffected.
Aroma Veil: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.
Aura Break: Lowers the multipliers of Dark Aura and Fairy Aura to 0.75x.
Bad Dreams: Deals 12.5% damage to sleeping opponents per turn.
Battery: This Pokemon's allies have the power of their special attacks multiplied by 1.3.
Battle Bond: After KOing a Pokemon: becomes Ash-Greninja, Water Shuriken: 20 power, hits 3x.
Beast Boost: This Pokemon's highest stat is raised by 1 if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.
Berserk: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 1 when it reaches 1/2 or less of its max HP.
Big Pecks: The wielder's Defense cannot be lowered.
Blaze: Boosts power of Fire-type moves 50% when at 1/3 of max HP or less.
Bulletproof: This Pokemon is protected from some Ball and Bomb moves.
Cheek Pouch: Increases HP when this Pokemon consumes a berry.
Clear Body: Stops the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's stats.
Color Change: Changes user's type to type of last attack that hit this Pokemon.
Comatose: This Pokemon cannot be statused, and is considered to be asleep.
Competitive: Raises the user's Special Attack stat by two stages when a stat is lowered, including the Special Attack stat. This does not include self-induced stat drops like those from Close Combat.
Compound Eyes: Raises accuracy by 30% and increases the probability of wild Pokemon holding items.
Contrary: The wielder's stat changes are reversed.
Corrosion: This Pokemon can poison or badly poison other Pokemon regardless of their typing.
Cursed Body: The wielder has a 30% chance to disable any move that hits it.
Cute Charm: Can infatuate Pokemon of opposite gender when struck and increases their wild encounter rate.
Damp: Prevents the use of Self-Destruct or Explosion.
Dancer: After another Pokemon uses a dance move, this Pokemon uses the same move.
Dark Aura: Increases the power of all Dark-type moves in battle to 1.3x.
Dazzling: While this Pokemon is active, allies are protected from opposing priority moves.
Defeatist: Halves the wielder's Attack and Special Attack if its HP drops below 50%.
Defiant: Boosts Attack by two stages for every stat drop.
Delta Stream: Summons Strong Winds until Pokemon leaves battle. Flying-type Pokemon take halved damage from Electric-, Ice-, and Rock-type moves, and weather-changing moves and abilities fail, except for Primordial Sea and Desolate Land.
Desolate Land: Summons Heavy Sun until Pokemon leaves battle. Water-type moves and weather changing moves/abilities fail, except for Primordial Sea and Delta Stream.
Disguise: If this Pokemon is a Mimikyu, it takes 0 damage the first time it is attacked in battle.
Download: User gets a stat boost depending on its opponent's stats.
Dry Skin: User absorbs Water-type attacks and has a weakness to Fire-type moves. Heals in rain and is damaged by sun.
Effect Spore: Induces paralysis, poison, or sleep on contact.
Electric Surge: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Electric Terrain.
Emergency Exit: This Pokemon switches out when it reaches 1/2 or less of its maximum HP. Does not switch out if hit by an attack that is boosted by Sheer Force.
Fairy Aura: Increases the power of all Fairy-type moves in battle to 1.3x.
Filter: Reduces damage from super effective hits by 1/4.
Flame Body: Enemies' contact moves have a 30% chance to burn them. Halves the amount of steps required to hatch Eggs.
Flare Boost: Special Attack is increased by 50% when burned.
Flash Fire: Grants immunity to Fire and increases Fire's power 50% when hit by a Fire move.
Flower Gift: Raises Attack and Special Defense of this Pokemon and its partners in sun.
Flower Veil: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokemon's stats.
Fluffy: This Pokemon takes 1/2 damage from contact moves, 2x damage from Fire moves.
Forewarn: Tells which of the opponent's moves has the highest Base Power.
Friend Guard: Reduces damage done to a teammate by 25%.
Full Metal Body: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages. Is not negated by the abilities Mold Breaker, Teravolt, and Turboblaze.
Fur Coat: Halves the damage done to this Pokemon by physical attacks.
Gale Wings: This Pokemon's Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1 when the user is at full HP.
Galvanize: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Electric type and have 1.2x power.
Gluttony: Consumes pinch Berries at 50% HP or less.
Gooey: Contact with this Pokemon decreases the attacker's Speed by 1 stage.
Grass Pelt: This Pokemon's Defense is boosted by 50% in Grassy Terrain
Grassy Surge: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Grassy Terrain.
Guts: Attack is increased 50% when afflicted by a non-volatile status. Ignores the Attack drop from burn.
Harvest: After each turn, the wielder may receive the Berry it used at a 50% chance (100% if in sun).
Healer: 30% chance to heal an adjacent teammate of a status condition every turn.
Honey Gather: Adds a chance of finding Honey after each in-game battle.
Hustle: Physical moves do 50% more damage at the cost of 20% accuracy. Increases wild encounter rate with higher level Pokemon.
Hyper Cutter: Prevents the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's Attack. Increases Cut's area of effect.
Ice Body: Heals 1/16 of max HP in hail.
Illuminate: Increases wild encounter rate (no effect in battles).
Illusion: The wielder appears as the last Pokemon in the party to the opponent.
Imposter: The wielder transforms into the opponent when it switches in.
Infiltrator: The wielder bypasses the foe's Light Screen, Reflect, Aurora Veil, Mist, Safeguard, and Substitute.
Innards Out: If this Pokemon is KOed with a move, that move's user loses an equal amount of HP.
Intimidate: Lowers the foe's Attack by 1 stage. Decreases wild encounter rate.
Iron Barbs: Deals 1/8 recoil damage when the opponent makes contact.
Iron Fist: Increases the power of punching moves by 20%.
Justified: Raises Attack by one stage when hit by a Dark-type move.
Keen Eye: Pokemon's accuracy cannot be lowered. Opponent's evasion boosts are ignored. Decreases wild encounter rate.
Klutz: This Pokemon both is unaffected by and will not utilize held items.
Levitate: This Pokemon is immune to Ground-type moves and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web. Arena Trap will not prevent this Pokemon from Switching.
Lightning Rod: All Electric-type attacks target this Pokemon. Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move.
Liquid Ooze: Leeching moves cause the enemy to lose HP instead.
Liquid Voice: This Pokemon's sound-based moves become Water type.
Long Reach: This Pokemon's attacks do not make contact with the target.
Magician: If this Pokemon is not holding an item, it steals the held item of a target it hits with a move.
Magma Armor: Cannot be frozen. Halves the amount of steps required to hatch Eggs.
Magnet Pull: Prevents opposing Steel-type Pokemon from switching. Ghost-types are unaffected. Increases the chance of encountering a Steel-type Pokemon in the wild.
Marvel Scale: Boosts Defense 50% when afflicted by a non-volatile status.
Mega Launcher: Boosts the power of Aura and Pulse moves, such as Aura Sphere and Dark Pulse, by 50%.
Merciless: This Pokemon's attacks are critical hits if the target is poisoned.
Minus: If allied with a Pokemon with Plus or Minus, its Special Attack increases by 50%.
Misty Surge: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Misty Terrain.
Mold Breaker: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified. For example, Magic Bounce will not bounce back Stealth Rock.
Moody: A random stat is lowered by 1 stage and another is boosted by 2 stages every turn.
Motor Drive: Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Speed by 1 stage when hit by a Electric-type move.
Moxie: Boosts Attack by 1 stage if the wielder knocks out another Pokemon.
Multiscale: Reduces damage by 50% if the wielder is at full health.
Multitype: Type changes depending on the held Plate. Prevents a held Plate from being removed.
Mummy: The opponent's ability becomes Mummy when it hits the wielder with a contact move.
Neuroforce: Super effective moves used by this Pokemon will do 1.2x damage.
No Guard: All attacks used by and used on this Pokemon will never miss.
Normalize: All moves used by this Pokemon become Normal-type and have their power boosted by 1.2x.
Oblivious: Grants immunity to infatuation, Captivate, and Taunt.
Overcoat: Grants immunity to damage from weather effects and powder moves.
Overgrow: Raises the power of Grass-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.
Parental Bond: Allows the Pokemon to hit twice with the same move in one turn. Second hit has 0.25x Base Power. Does not affect status, multi-hit, self-KO, or (in doubles) spread moves.
Pickpocket: The wielder immediately steals an item from an attacker using a contact move.
Pickup: If the wielder has no held item, it gets the last item consumed at the end of the turn. Adds a chance of finding an item after each battle.
Pixilate: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Fairy-type and deals 1.2x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.
Plus: If allied with a Pokemon with Plus or Minus, its Special Attack increases by 50%.
Poison Heal: Heals 1/8 of max HP per turn when poisoned.
Poison Point: Enemies' contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning them.
Poison Touch: The wielder's contact moves gain a 30% chance to poison the opponent.
Power Construct: If Zygarde 10%/50%, changes to Complete if at 1/2 max HP or less at end of turn.
Power of Alchemy: This Pokemon copies the Ability of an ally that faints.
Prankster: Non-damaging moves have their priority increased by one level. Opposing Dark-types are immune to affected moves.
Pressure: Enemy attacks lose 1 extra PP. Increases wild encounter rate.
Primordial Sea: Summons Heavy Rain until Pokemon leaves battle. Fire-type moves and weather changing moves/abilities fail, except for Desolate Land and Delta Stream.
Prism Armor: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks. Is not negated by the abilities Mold Breaker, Teravolt, and Turboblaze or the moves Moongeist Beam and Sunsteel Strike.
Protean: Right before this Pokemon uses a move, it changes its type to match that move. Hidden Power is interpreted as its Hidden Power type, rather than Normal.
Psychic Surge: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Psychic Terrain.
Queenly Majesty: While this Pokemon is active, allies are protected from opposing priority moves.
Quick Feet: Increases Speed by 50% when afflicted with a status condition.
RKS System: If this Pokemon is a Silvally, its type changes to match its held Memory.
Rain Dish: Heals 1/16 of max HP in rain.
Rattled: Raises Speed one stage when hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type move.
Receiver: This Pokemon copies the Ability of an ally that faints.
Reckless: Increases the power of recoil moves by 20%.
Refrigerate: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Ice-type and deals 1.2x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.
Regenerator: Wielder heals 1/3 of its maximum HP on switching out.
Rivalry: Raises move power by 25% if the opponent has the same gender, and reduces by 25% if the opponent has the opposite gender. Genderless Pokemon do not affect this ability.
Rough Skin: Deals 1/8 recoil damage when the opponent makes contact.
Run Away: Increases the chance of successfully escaping battle with a wild Pokemon.
Sand Force: Increases power of Ground-, Rock-, and Steel-type attacks by 30% in a sandstorm.
Sand Veil: Evasion increases by 20% in a sandstorm.
Sap Sipper: Grants immunity to Grass-type moves and boosts Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Grass-type move.
Schooling: If user is Wishiwashi, changes to School Form if it has > 1/4 max HP, else Solo Form.
Scrappy: Can hit Ghost-types with Fighting- and Normal-type moves.
Serene Grace: This Pokemon's secondary effect chances are doubled.
Shadow Shield: If this Pokemon is at full HP, damage taken from attacks is halved. Is not negated by the abilities Mold Breaker, Teravolt, and Turboblaze or the moves Moongeist Beam and Sunsteel Strike.
Shadow Tag: Prevents opposing Pokemon from switching, except when holding a Shed Shell. Does not affect Ghost-type Pokemon or Pokemon with Shadow Tag.
Sheer Force: Increases power of moves with secondary effects by 30%, but removes the effects. Life Orb recoil is ignored when a move that is affected by Sheer Force is used.
Shields Down: If Minior, switch-in/end of turn it changes to Core at 1/2 max HP or less, else Meteor. Minior in Meteor Form cannot be afflicted with status, even by a Pokemon with Mold Breaker.
Simple: Doubles the effect of stat boosts and drops.
Skill Link: Multi-hit moves will always hit the maximum number of times.
Slow Start: Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.
Slush Rush: If Hail is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled; immunity to Hail.
Sniper: Critical hits do 2.25x damage instead of 1.5x.
Solar Power: Loses 12.5% HP in sun each turn. Special Attack increases by 50%.
Solid Rock: Reduces damage from super effective hits by 1/4.
Soul-Heart: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 1 stage when another Pokemon faints.
Speed Boost: Speed raises at end of turn. Does not boost Speed when the user switches in.
Stakeout: This Pokemon's attacks deal double damage if the target switched in this turn.
Stamina: This Pokemon's Defense is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a move.
Stance Change: Only affects Aegislash. If this Pokemon uses a Physical or Special move, it changes to Blade forme. If this Pokemon uses King's Shield, it changes to Shield forme.
Static: Enemies' contact moves can paralyze them.
Steadfast: Speed is boosted one stage when flinched.
Steelworker: This Pokemon's Steel-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.
Stench: Adds a 10% flinch chance for moves that do not have one. Decreases wild encounter rate.
Sticky Hold: This Pokemon's item cannot be removed. Increases the chance of encountering Pokemon while fishing.
Storm Drain: All Water-type attacks target this Pokemon. Grants immunity to Water-type moves and boosts Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Water-type move.
Strong Jaw: This Pokemon receives a 50% power boost for jaw attacks such as Bite and Crunch.
Sturdy: The wielder cannot be KOed in one hit from full HP. OHKO moves will fail.
Suction Cups: Cannot be forced to switch. Increases chance of encountering Pokemon while fishing.
Super Luck: Critical hit rate increases one stage.
Surge Surfer: If Electric Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
Swarm: Boosts power of Bug-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.
Sweet Veil: Prevents allies from being put to Sleep.
Symbiosis: This Pokemon immediately passes its item to an ally after their item is consumed.
Synchronize: When statused, the enemy is also statused. Can pass nature to wild Pokemon.
Tangling Hair: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.
Technician: Increases power of moves with 60 base power or less by 50%.
Telepathy: Does not take damage from allies' attacks.
Teravolt: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified. For example, Volt Absorb will not heal or grant an immunity to Electric-type moves.
Torrent: Boosts power of Water-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.
Tough Claws: This Pokemon's contact attacks do 1.3x damage.
Toxic Boost: Attack is increased by 50% when poisoned.
Triage: This Pokemon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.
Truant: This Pokemon does nothing every other turn.
Turboblaze: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified. For example, Thick Fat will not half Fire- and Ice-type damage.
Unaware: Ignores stat boosts and debuffs on other Pokemon.
Unburden: Speed doubles when an item is used or lost. Boost is lost after the user switches out.
Unnerve: Prevents the foe from consuming its held Berry item.
Victory Star: Increases the accuracy of the wielder and allies on its side of the field by 10%.
Vital Spirit: Prevents sleep. Increases wild encounters with higher level Pokemon.
Volt Absorb: Heals 25% HP when hit by an Electric-type attack.
Water Absorb: Heals 25% HP when hit by a Water-type attack.
Water Bubble: This Pokemon's Water power is 2x; it can't be burned; Fire power against it is halved.
Water Compaction: This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages after it is damaged by a Water-type move.
Weak Armor: Boosts Speed by 2 stages and lowers Defense by 1 stage when the user is hit by a physical move.
White Smoke: Prevents the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's stats and decreases wild encounter rate.
Wimp Out: This Pokemon switches out when it reaches 1/2 or less of its maximum HP. Does not switch out if hit by an attack that is boosted by Sheer Force.
Wonder Guard: Only super effective attacks harm this Pokemon.
Wonder Skin: Reduces the accuracy of a status move to 50%.
Zen Mode: The wielder changes forme when below 50% of its max HP.
